If discarded, add 1 (2) Shiv (Shivs) into your hand.

Exhaust up to 2 (3) cards.

Transform  (and upgrade) a card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Venom Shield

cards.name: Edgework
cards.description:
Add 1 (2) Twisted Shiv (Shivs) into your hand.
Whenever you would add a Shiv to your hand, add a Twisted Shiv instead.

cards.name: Equivocation
cards.description:
Apply 2 (4) Weak.
Remove all but 1 Weak from the target and apply 1 (2) Poison for each stack removed.

cards.name: Evasive Maneuvers

Discard a card.

cards.name: Eye Gouge

Deal 4 damage.
If target is Weak, it loses 1 (2) Strength.
If target is not Weak, apply 1 (2) Weak.
Exhaustive 2 (3).

cards.name: Fan of Knives
cards.description:
Add 1 (2) Shiv (Shivs) into your hand.
Exhaust all Shivs in your hand.
For each one Exhausted, deal 3 (4) damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust (Exhaustive 2).

cards.name: Ghost Step
cards.description:
Retain 1 (2) card (cards) this turn.
Exhaust.
If you are (have) subterfuge:Compromised (any debuffs), end this turn and take another turn.

cards.name: Jester
cards.description:
Add 2 (3) Twisted Shivs into your hand.

When discarded, add 1 (2) Twisted Shiv (Shivs) into your hand.

Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Ready Arms
cards.description:
Choose a card.
Attack: increase damage by 3.

Discard (Place) it (on top of your draw pile).

relics.name: Lethal Shivs
relics.flavorText: They're harder, better, faster, and stronger than regular Shivs.

relics.name: Poison Capsule
relics.description: Reduce damage taken from Poisoned targets by 3.
relics.flavorText: Take 1 a day to help develop your Poison immunity.

relics.name: Shiva Statuette
relics.description: For every 8 Shivs played, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: An elegant stone statuette of Shiva.

relics.name: Statikk Shiv
relics.description: Every 10th Shiv played will deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: An ancient, priceless relic. It probably belongs in a museum.

relics.name: Scrap Shiv
relics.description:
Whenever you draw a Status, Exhaust it and add a Shiv to your hand.
Whenever you draw a Curse, Exhaust it and add a Shiv+ to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Turning garbage into sharp weapons since 1969.

relics.name: Dancing Shiv
relics.description: For every 8 Shivs played, gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: It makes you feel like dancing!

keywords.name: Choke
keywords.description: For the rest of this turn, whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses HP.

keywords.name: Compromised
keywords.description: If a target is Vulnerable or Weak.

keywords.name: Contamination
keywords.description: Your next attack will apply this amount of Poison.

keywords.name: Cripple
keywords.description: Convert all of the target's Poison into Paralytic Poison.

keywords.name: Deflection
keywords.description: At the start of the next turn, gain Block equal to your stacks of Deflection and lose all stacks of Deflection.

keywords.name: Edgework
keywords.description: Whenever you would add a Shiv to your hand, add a Twisted Shiv instead.

keywords.name: Excontaminate
keywords.description: Remove all Poison from the target. Your next Attack will apply that amount of Poison.

keywords.name: Garrote
keywords.description: For the rest of combat, whenever you play a card, the enemy loses HP.

keywords.name: Intuition
keywords.description: For the next X turns, draw 1 additional card next turn for each attack received.

keywords.name: Noxious Saboteur
keywords.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage to a Poisoned target, apply Paralytic Poison.

keywords.name: Opportunism
keywords.description: Whenever you attack a Compromised or Poisoned target, gain temporary Dexterity.

keywords.name: Oppositify
keywords.description:
Converts Standard Debuffs into buffs.
Weak > Vigor
Vulnerable > Toughness
Negative Dexterity > Positive Dexterity
Negative Strength > Positive Strength

keywords.name: Paralytic Poison
keywords.description: Reduces attack damage by this amount. Decreases by half at the end of the turn. If target is Poisoned, only decreases by 2.

keywords.name: Parkour
keywords.description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, draw a card.

keywords.name: Parry
keywords.description: This turn, when you Block for the exact amount of damage of a single attack, reduce the attacker's Strength.

keywords.name: PineTarDesc1
keywords.description: Retain.

keywords.name: PineTarDesc2
keywords.description: When *Retained, reduce the cost of this card by 1.

keywords.name: Quickwitted
keywords.description: For the rest of this turn, whenever you draw a card, gain Block. Includes cards drawn at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: STEAL!
keywords.description: Remove from the target and apply to yourself.

keywords.name: Sap
keywords.description: This target's Weak will no longer decrease at the end of the turn. Attacking a target with 6 or more Weak will decrease its Strength by 2 and remove all of its Weak.

keywords.name: Standard Buff
keywords.description: Any buff except for: Beat of Death, Fading, Invincible, Minion, Mode Shift, Life Link, Shifting, and Unawakened.

keywords.name: Standard Debuff
keywords.description: Includes Vulnerable, Weak, negative Dexterity, and negative Strength.

keywords.name: Toughness
keywords.description: This turn, reduce ALL incoming damage by this amount.

keywords.name: Vaporize
keywords.description: Remove all Poison from target. Target loses HP equal to twice its current amount of Poison.

mods.name: Subterfuge
mods.description:
Subterfuge: Silent Expansion Mod
